issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Steps to Reproduce
Android is not recognized - have double checked directory structure and verisons several times. The problem still remains.

Iphone simulator starts but quits right after it launches.

h3. Actual Result
None

h3. Expected Result
Simulator should be working at least.
fields.summary: tried to unistall and install android and/or iphone neither of which works properly

comments.body:
Have you read the Getting Started guide?  http://docs.appcelerator.com/titanium/latest/#!/guide/Quick_Start

What have you tried? You need to provide more information in order for us to know what the problem might be.
